markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Vulpinal (Fox Agathion)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1056)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Vulpinals serve as the cunning and clever musicians and minstrels of the agathions. Incredibly far-ranging, these fox-like humanoids love traveling to learn and teach about all the unique songs, dances, myths, and traditions they can find. Though they prefer to travel alone, vulpinals are extremely gregarious toward those they meet on their journeys. They enjoy participating in the festivities of cultures they encounter, and they're known to form small traveling groups of like-minded individuals if they believe that their shared expertise can prove beneficial.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Agathion_Vulpinal.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Vulpinal](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1056)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Agathion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=349" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=23" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 11</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293), [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +14, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +11, [Nirvana Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +16, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
[handheld instrument](/Equipment.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 105

**Weaknesses**
evil 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +15 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d10+4 piercing plus 1d6 good

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+4 slashing plus 1d6 good

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 24
- **2nd**
[Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will; evil only), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only)
- **3rd**
[Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Champion Focus Spell** DC 24, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Lay on Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=395)

**Fox's Cunning**   A vulpinal's core value is cunning. They can apply their knowledge and stories from their extensive travels to just about any situation in an instant. Before spending any other action on their turn, the vulpinal can [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) as a free action.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Vulpinal Flair</title>

Bipedal vulpinals stand around 3 feet tall, with humanoid clawed hands and fluffy tails almost as long as their bodies. They typically appear with red fur, though leaders feature either white or black pelts with gray sprinkled across their muzzles and backs. Fox agathions like to wear stylish but functional clothing from the places they visit, often embellishing themselves with small trinkets and souvenirs they picked up along the way. 
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-216" />
name: Vulpinal
